englishTranslationText: For	which	day	were	they	appointed?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kis	din	ke	liye	thehraye	gaye	they.

englishTranslationText: And	what	do	you	know,	what	the	Day	of	Decision	is!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	tu	kya	jāne	woh	Roz-e-	Faisla	kaisa	hai?

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Jhutlāne	waloñ	ki	us	din kharābi

englishTranslationText: Did	We	not	destroy	the	earlier	people?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kya	ham	ne	agloñ	ko	halāk	na farmāya

englishTranslationText: We	shall	then	send	the	latter	after	them.
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	pichloñ	ko	unke	peechhe pahuñchayeñ	ge

englishTranslationText: This	is	how	We	deal	with	the	guilty.
romanUrduTranslationText: Mujrimoñ	ke	sāth	ham	aisa	hi	karte	haiñ	.

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi

englishTranslationText: Did	We	not	create	you	from	an	abject	fluid?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	ham	ne	tumheñ	ek	be-qadr	pāni	se	
paida	na	farmāya

englishTranslationText: We	then	kept	it	in	a	safe	place.
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	usey	ek	mehfooz	jagah	meiñ	rakha

englishTranslationText:
We	then	calculated;	so	how	excellently	do	
We	control!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	ham	ne	andāza	farmāya	to	ham	kya	hi	
achchhe	qādir

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi.

englishTranslationText: Did	We	not	make	the	earth	a	storehouse?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	ham	ne	zameen	ko	jama	karne	wāli	na	
kiya.

englishTranslationText: For	the	living	and	the	dead	among	you?

arabicText: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتٍۢ وَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُم مَّآءًۭ فُرَاتًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	We	placed	high	mountains	as	anchors	
in	it	and	gave	you	sweet	water	to	drink
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	ne	us	meiñ	ooñche	ooñche	langar	
dāle	aur	ham	ne	tumheiñ	khoob	meetha	
pāni	pilāya
